channel.title: Netflix
channel.description: I got Netflix on the fourth and I seriously actually like it. Does anyone else have it and like it? What is your thoughts on it? I'm currently watching the whole show of Prison Break.

item.title: Netflix
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:16, topic:395318”]I used blockbuster…wut.

Not really, my parents use Netflix a lot though. I use Gamefly. :P[/quote]
Netflix bought Blockbuster so it looks like they have a competing company, they keep the standards low so you think of netflix soon. They made blockbuster start sending games threw the mail cause netflix is working on a deal to have games instantly stream to your system for like 30$ a month.

Read full topic

item.title: Netflix
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:8, topic:395318”]PRISON BREAK FREAKIN RULES.
ps. what’s netflix?[/quote]
US only I think. Anyways, Netflix is basically dvd rental via priority 1-day mail. They also, for PS3/360/Wii (pc ofc as well) users, have on-demand for some movies and such. Pay by month, and you get unlimited within that month of whatever bundle you paid for. I believe its like $9 a month or something for the 1-DVD rental and unlimited on-demand, so its fairly cheap if you have decent internet, it can work out under $0.50 a movie in a short time.

Read full topic

I’ve watch weeds, dexter, and a bunch of movies.

I don’t have it all the time though because I use other peoples and when they find out someone else is on their netflix they usually change their passwords

Also, netflix is a company that sends dvd’s in the mail or streams movies in like half a second to your t.v. unlimited for like 8$ a month (wow that sounded like an ad) www.netflix.com its pretty fucken awesome.

item.title: Netflix
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

I used to have it, and I thought it was pretty convenient. The only thing I didn’t like was that it was my stepdads account, so the DVD orders were backed up with his shit (and most of it I wasn’t interested in seeing), so all I really used it for was streaming on my xbox. But at the time there weren’t many movies to stream :\

Read full topic
